attributes.action: stop the police from taking and keeping DNA samples not related to rape or murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The infringement of privacy and liberty is a serious matter and should only be contemplated in the most serious of circumstances. The taking and keeping by police of DNA for any reason other than proving the commission by a person, or the elimination of a person from, rape and murder investigations should be stopped.
